verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees.<WH4609> In my distress<WH6869> I cried<WH7121> to the LORD,<WH3068> and he heard<WH6030> me.
Deliver<WH5337> my soul,<WH5315> O LORD,<WH3068> from lying<WH8267> lips,<WH8193> and from a deceitful<WH7423> tongue.<WH3956>
What<WH4100> shall be given<WH5414> to you? or what<WH4100> shall be done<WH3254> to you, you false<WH7423> tongue?<WH3956>
Sharp<WH8150> arrows<WH2671> of the mighty,<WH1368> with coals<WH1513> of juniper.<WH7574>
Woe<WH190> is me, that I sojourn<WH1481> in Mesech,<WH4902> that I dwell<WH7931> in the tents<WH168> of Kedar!<WH6938>
My soul<WH5315> has long<WH7227> dwelled<WH7931> with him that hates<WH8130> peace.<WH7965>
I am for peace:<WH7965> but when<WH3588> I speak,<WH1696> they are for war.<WH4421>
